Sealers

The best in the market, the Entrhal Sealer range gives you peace of mind on the seal quality of your medical sterile packages. The Entrhal Sealers are lightweight, durable, cost effective and compact, hence a much smaller footprint compared to other Sealers. You are rest assured of a Sealer that meets ISO 11607-2 and the European standard EN868-5. Our Sealers support sterilisation departments to ensure guaranteed repeatable results and increased patient safety.
